summary: This document is an email chain from July 2020 regarding a public request for Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest record and mugshot. An attorney, David Hakimfar, inquires about obtaining these records, and the email is forwarded internally within an organization (likely a government or court office) to the press office for handling.

persons.name: David Hakimfar
persons.context: Attorney who sent an email request on July 14, 2020, seeking to obtain the arrest record and mugshot of defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the case 'People v. Maxwell' for whom an arrest record and mugshot are being requested.

connections.description: Hakimfar, an attorney, is seeking official records (arrest record, mugshot) related to Maxwell's criminal case.

events.title: Request for Maxwell's Arrest Records
events.description: Attorney David Hakimfar sends an email requesting information on how to obtain the arrest record and mugshot of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Internal Forwarding of Request
events.description: The request for Maxwell's records is forwarded internally, with a suggestion to send it to the press office to handle.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from July 2020 concerning a public records request related to Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest.
Attorney David Hakimfar formally requested access to Maxwell's arrest record and mugshot.
The request was forwarded internally, indicating standard procedure for handling media or public inquiries about the case.
The case is referenced as 'People v. Maxwell', confirming it was an active criminal proceeding at the time.
